properties.value:
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const startButton = document.getElementById('startButton');
        const learnMoreButton = document.getElementById('learnMoreButton');

        if (startButton) {
            startButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Replace with the actual URL or page ID of your booking page in Joget
                // Example for a Userview page: window.location.href = '#/pages/your_booking_page_id';
                // Or a direct URL if applicable: window.location.href = 'https://yourjogetsite.com/jw/web/userview/yourUserviewId/yourBookingPagePath';
                alert('Redirecting to the booking page!'); // For demonstration
                // window.location.href = 'your-booking-page-url';
            });
        }

        if (learnMoreButton) {
            learnMoreButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                // Replace with the actual URL or page ID of your "Learn More" or "About" page
                alert('Redirecting to the "Learn More" page!'); // For demonstration
                // window.location.href = 'your-about-page-url';
            });
        }

        // You could add more dynamic effects here, e.g.,
        // - A simple welcome message that appears after a delay
        // - Fetching dynamic content (e.g., number of facilities) if you have an API
    });
</script>
